group_1.textLeft: A survival quiz...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
The fans and I will compete in a quiz together.
Instead of buzzing in to answer first, everyone will@write down their answers at the same time.
If you fail even one question, you're@disqualified immediately.
The last one standing wins Kamigiri's sword...!

group_1.textLeft: I see, so that's what you meant by a@"survival" quiz!"

group_1.textRight: It's a bit cliché, but I like it!
It's a simple, straightforward idea, and involves extensive fan interaction.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm!
I can see it now - Sayu-Sayu in her swimsuit,@answering questions about Mizuna and summer-related topics...
Though, why a swimsuit? ...I'm not sure if@we can come up with a decent excuse.
But as long as we keep things running smoothly,@I doubt people would care too much...

group_1.textRight: W-wait!
Um...I'm not against having questions@about Mizuna and summer, but...

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong?

group_1.textRight: ...I'd prefer the quiz to be about swords.

group_1.textLeft: Swords?
Oh yeah...because you're a sword idol, right?

group_1.textRight: ...Erm...yes, that's...exactly why...

group_1.textLeft: It makes total sense! You've put lots of thought@into this!

group_1.textRight: Um, nnh... *Sigh*

group_1.textLeft: What is it, Sayuki? Is something the matter?
Sayuki...

group_1.textRight: Mmmmmnnnnnn...
I was lying! Forgive meeeeeee!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?!

group_1.textRight: The truth is, I - I really want to have that sword,
so I came up with a contest that would be@easiest for me to win!
I know I deceived you guys, and I honestly@didn't mean to, it's just–

group_1.textLeft: Yes, Sayuki. All of us - Mayu excluded - knew@exactly what you were up to.

group_1.textRight: What...?!

group_1.textLeft: Well, the quiz idea in and of itself isn't a@bad one.
But I don't think the fans will want to participate@in a game they can't win...

group_1.textRight: You're right…it's a total no-go.
I got so focused on the sword that I didn't think@it through… Time for my "Gotta Get Better" pose...
...Is this sword of Kamigiri's truly that significant?

group_1.textLeft: Well, yes.
Kamigiri is one of the most celebrated@swordsmiths of the modern era.
He has a massive backlog of orders, so it's very@difficult to get a commission from him.

group_1.textRight: Goodness... I hadn't realized it was so valuable.
I imagine it must be worth quite the sum, no?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. One of his swords went for...

group_1.textRight: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*
Th...THAT much?!

group_1.textLeft: And that was the cheapest sword I could find!

group_1.textRight: Hoo… This is certainly beyond my ken...

group_1.textCenter: But it's only worth it if I can win it fair and square… @[chara:303301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:303301:eyeClose_1][chara:303301:lipSynch_1]I'm sorry for being so selfish!
